data.event: The county was created in 1858 and later organized in 1886.
The county was created in 1858 and later organized in 1886.

event.title: 1932 Texas Republican gubernatorial nominee, Orville Bullington, resided

data.event: The 1932 Texas Republican gubernatorial nominee, Orville Bullington, resided in Knox County and served as county attorney early in his career.
The camp was profiled in a story that aired on July 21, 2010 on National Public Radio's Morning Edition program.
